response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,200,000. Considering this, we propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. We hope to discuss the details further and welcome your decision soon. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.", "product_price": 950000}
